decision_conditions: The proposed amendments cannot be accepted as a minor material amendments to planning permission reference 223365FUL dated 15/02/2023, in accordance with Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for 'Minor material Amendments following grant of planning permission', on the following grounds: the proposed alteration to the red line boundary would result in a materially different scheme to that approved under the substantive application, to the detriment of the quantum and quality of communal amenity space to be provided, and through the awkward subdivision of the plot being out of keeping with the character and appearance of the conservation area and the locality. As such, the proposal the proposal completely alters the nature of the development and is therefore contrary to policies HC1, D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7C, 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Ealing Green Conservation Area Management Plan (2008) and Ealing's Protocol for Minor Material Amendments following grant of planning permission (2015).
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary conditions no.2, no.4 and no.7 seeking to vary the approved redline boundary of the site pursuant to planning permission reference  223365FUL dated 15/02/2023 for ''Conversion of existing building from 2no. flats into 9no. self-contained residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage''
